channel.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
channel.description: For an older feel to the server, would you rather have piety and chivalry or go without them?

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:17, topic:460350”][quote author=Ambokile link=topic=563270.msg4109468#msg4109468 date=1348389469]
I think that they could fit into a 317, as long as they were done well.
[/quote]
It’s not hard to fuck up a prayer when it’s almost every server in existence.[/quote]
Who said that I meant they must work properly? It should be a challenge to gain access to them.

Read full topic

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Piety can’t be used with any other attack/defense prayers. You’re basically stuck with protection prayers or smite.

Read full topic

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Look on that wiki page - smilarly-coloured prayers conflict.

I don’t have 70 prayer in RS though so I can’t confirm

Read full topic

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
item.dc:creator: @Nebulae Nebulae
item.description:
@Nebulae wrote:

Can you verify that? I am quite certain you can’t use any offence/defence prayers alongside each other. The same if you was to use turmoil or the attack/strength leech prayers.

Read full topic

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Nebulae, post:10, topic:460350”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=563270.msg4107608#msg4107608 date=1348173340]

I prefer them because it’s a one click prayer instead of 3 attack, strength and defence prayers. They are still considered old school. Making a requirement such as a quest would make it better too, in my opinion.

You can use them together with those prayers…
[/quote]
You can’t use ultimate strength, attack and defence and piety at the same time.[/quote]
The only prayer you cant use with Piety is Chivalry.

Read full topic

item.title: With or without Piety + Chivalry?

I prefer them because it’s a one click prayer instead of 3 attack, strength and defence prayers. They are still considered old school. Making a requirement such as a quest would make it better too, in my opinion.

You can use them together with those prayers…
[/quote]
You can’t use ultimate strength, attack and defence and piety at the same time.[/quote]
Tell me more about how smart you are

RuneScape Wiki

Prayer

Prayer is a combat skill that grants the player specialised buffs in combat by evoking the power of the dead. All players start with limited access to the Prayer skill. As a player's Prayer level increases, they gain access to new prayers. As players...

Read full topic

This. The highest prayer when I used to like playing runescape was Smite
